LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.GeneralCostsTooltip: Costs that apply to most cases - colony members, friendly visitors.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.ColonyCostsTooltip: Costs that apply to colony pawns (colonists, mechs, etc. but not animals).
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.FriendlyCostsToolti: Costs that apply to friendly pawns, such as visiting trade caravans.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.DirtyCostTooltip: Additional perceived cost for using terrain that produces filth. The higher the number, the more friendly pawns will try to avoid such terrain.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.SideDoorCostTooltip: Additional perceived cost for using door that has the 'Side Door' priority set. The higher the number, the more friendly pawns will try to avoid the door.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.EmergencyDoorCostTo: Additional perceived cost for using door that has the 'Emergency Door' priority set. The higher the number, the more friendly pawns will try to avoid the door.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.GrowingZoneCost: Extra cost for growing zone tiles: {0}
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.GrowingZoneCostTool: Additional perceived cost for walking on growing zones. The higher the number, the more friendly pawns will try to avoid the door.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.VisitingCaravanOutd: Extra cost for outdoor room tiles: {0}
Additional perceived cost for using outdoor room. The higher the number, the more friendly pawns will try to avoid such rooms.
LanguageData.PathfindingAvoidance.VisitingCaravanIndo: Extra cost for indoor room tiles: {0}
Additional perceived cost for using indoor room. The higher the number, the more friendly pawns will try to avoid such rooms.
